Articles.Content: Hey, does anyone know to what scale Bobcat's Mir parts are?  decided to use those parts in my version 3 of my ISS build but want to know what the scale is for those so I can build the other parts accordingly

1 hour ago, Sampa said:

Hey, does anyone know to what scale Bobcat's Mir parts are?  decided to use those parts in my version 3 of my ISS build but want to know what the scale is for those so I can build the other parts accordingly

Just look at the dimensions of the part in VAB and compare to whatever the real dimensions are.
